SMW Subobject for CookedHigh Alchemy value: 24Buy limit: 6000Examine: A nicely roasted spider threaded onto an arrow shaft.Is members only: trueIs variant of: Spider on shaftImage: File:Spider on shaft.pngUses infobox: ItemWeight: 0.900Value: 40Version anchor: CookedRelease date: 9 August 2005Item ID: 6299

A spider on shaft can be made on Karamja during the Tai Bwo Wannai Cleanup minigame. Kill a jungle spider to get a spider carcass, then use an arrow shaft with the spider carcass. Alternatively, a skewer stick can be used instead, resulting in a spider on stick. The raw version cannot be purchased on the Grand Exchange; only the cooked one is available.

When the spider is on the shaft, it can be cooked, requiring level 16 Cooking and granting 80 experience when successful. Players may burn the spider while cooking one, resulting in a burnt spider; the burn rate while cooking these will decrease as players reach higher Cooking levels. It will stop burning entirely at Cooking level 48 on both ranges and fires. When eaten, it heals a random amount of health between 7 and 10, and the shaft is destroyed.

Hudo's shop Grand Tree Groceries sells cooked spiders on shafts for 40 coins, although they are never in stock.

A player attaching a spider carcass to an arrow shaft.

Contents

  • 1 Creation
    • 1.1 Skewering
    • 1.2 Cooking
    • 1.3 Cooking chance
  • 2 Shop locations

A '''spider on shaft''' can be made on [[Karamja]] during the [[Tai Bwo Wannai Cleanup]] minigame. Kill a [[jungle spider]] to get a [[spider carcass]], then use an [[arrow shaft]] with the spider carcass. Alternatively, a [[skewer stick]] can be used instead, resulting in a [[spider on stick]]. The raw version cannot be purchased on the [[Grand Exchange]]; only the cooked one is available.

When the spider is on the shaft, it can be cooked, requiring level 16 [[Cooking]] and granting 80 experience when successful. Players may burn the spider while cooking one, resulting in a [[Spider on shaft (burnt)|burnt spider]]; the [[burn rate]] while cooking these will decrease as players reach higher Cooking levels. It will stop burning entirely at [[Cooking]] level 48 on both ranges and fires. When eaten, it heals a random amount of health between 7 and 10, and the shaft is destroyed.

[[Hudo]]'s shop [[Grand Tree Groceries]] sells cooked spiders on shafts for 40 coins, although they are never in stock.

[[File:Spider_to_stick.gif|frame|left|150px|A player attaching a spider carcass to an arrow shaft.]]
